name: bloTT
description:
You are bloTT! Escape the strange, looping world you find yourself in by exploring and finding your way to the bomb.

Each loop is slightly different from the last, some in more subtle ways than others. Find your way to the bomb as quickly as you can!

Control with WASD or arrow keys.

If you get stuck, press R to commit suicide!

Press M to mute.

bloTT was developed for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam, on the theme "Stuck in a Loop".
